column4: hi, i'm running breezy on ppc this morning I was updating... any suggestions cuz x-common gave me this error:  E: /var/cache/apt/archives/x-common_1.08_all.deb: trying to overwrite `/usr/lib/X11/fonts', which is also in package xfonts-base
its a known issue and on forums....in breezy badger forum..I just installed breezy so I dont know if im affected ( not everyone is apparantly)
thanks... I suspect they'll set it right soon...
